content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a great place to live. So, what price were you thinking for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your apartment looks very nice and modern. I appreciate the central location and the proximity to amenities. Regarding the rental price, I'm looking for something that reflects the quality of the apartment and its location. Could we start with €800 per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: €800 per month is a good starting point, Farhad. I believe the quality of the apartment and its prime location justify a higher price. However, I'm willing to negotiate. What other terms or conditions might make the apartment more attractive to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm interested solely in the rental price at this moment. I'm a student, and I'm looking for an unfurnished apartment that fits my budget. While the location and quality of your apartment are indeed appealing, I must find a price that aligns with my financial situation. Is there any flexibility in the €800 you mentioned?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: As a landlord, I'm always open to reasonable offers. €800 is a fair price considering the market value and the amenities provided. However, if you're a student and looking for a more student-friendly price, I might be able to accommodate your needs. How much lower would you be comfortable going?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. As a student, I'm mindful of costs, and while €800 is a fair price, I'm hoping to find a more affordable option within my budget. Would you be open to €750 per month? This would be a good compromise for me.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: €750 per month is a significant reduction from the initial offer. While I understand your financial constraints as a student, I must also consider the value of the apartment. I'm willing to go down to €775 per month, which is still lower than the market rate for such a prime location. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, €775 per month is an attractive offer, and it's very close to my budget. I'm grateful for your consideration. Would it be possible to discuss any additional perks or considerations that might be included in this price?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: As I mentioned earlier, I'm looking to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. However, considering your situation as a student, I'm willing to offer a one-time discount of €50 on the security deposit if you agree to the €775 per month rent. This would be a gesture of goodwill on my part. Would this be acceptable to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm very pleased with your offer of €775 per month, and the additional discount on the security deposit is a generous gesture. I believe this reflects well on your character and your commitment to your tenants. I would like to accept your offer and confirm that I agree to the price of €775 Euro! TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
